name: MsgGetPasses
doc: This message retrieves the list of passes over a ground station during a period of time. It will return the list of passes

fields.name: userRole
fields.doc: User role. Values: ROLE_READ_ONLY - 0 ROLE_NORMAL - 1 ROLE_ADMINISTRATOR - 2

fields.name: startTime
fields.doc: Start time of time period. Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:SS

fields.name: stopTime
fields.doc: Stop time of time period. Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:SS
